name: DJ Miche Collection
description: Dictator Miche is our favourite logo because we used it to name our project to first project for ICDIIS. It`s our special design.

name: DJ STM32 Idlers
description: You give your all to the workout, pushing yourself to the limit. Let the STM32 keep you cool and comfortable with its soft fabric.

name: Overshot JUNGLE
description: Italian brand of everyday classic Backsideclub. Straight cut. Adjustable cuffs and hem with buttons. Woven patch on the back. Made in Italy.

name: Han Kjobenhavn Hoodie
description: Printed graphic artwork on the chest. Will complement your basic wardrobe.Original designer everyday item. Made in Portugal.
